title: Case-Based Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Familiarity with foundational instructional design theories and elementary education practice experience
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented case analysis training for current elementary education practitioners, with optional smartphone-based supplementary materials.

learning_goals: Learners can identify core problem areas with over 80% accuracy by analyzing case materials from actual educational settings
Learners can propose at least three concrete solutions based on instructional design principles, incorporating peer feedback
Learners can expand discussion scope by at least two levels by applying instructors' facilitation techniques during case discussions

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
